name: Retarded Creatures and Caverns
overview: Retarded Creatures and Caverns is a parody of the Lord of the Rings and the sequel of An Everyday Tale of a Seeker of Gold.[1] It wasn't part of the Balrogian Trilogy, but was included in the collections Best of the Indies Vol. 1, Balrog's Big Four and Numero Dos. The author of the game was John Wilson. In this game Bulbo's old friend Algernon, also called Stroller, must investigate the castle named Toidi and kill the dragon living in the castle. Originally released for the ZX Spectrum in 1989, it was converted to C64 by the original author in 2019.
